title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 4118 - Purses And Conditions
content:

State Regulations
§ 4118.1 - Purses shall follow race results
§ 4118.2 - Deductions
§ 4118.3 - Racing inducements

§ 4118.5 - Drivers' and trainers' insurance
§ 4118.6 - Stall applications
§ 4118.7 - Incomplete finish

§ 4118.10 - International championships

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 4118

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128; L. 1940, ch. 254, § 36 as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
